props.children: Select Categories will work when you select Product Query By is Category otherwise it will not work
Select Tags will work when you select Product Query By is Tag otherwise it will not work
Select Rating will work when you select Product Query By is Rating otherwise it will not work
Select Atrribute will work when you select Product Query By is Attribute otherwise it will not work
Select Author will work when you select Product Query By is Author otherwise it will not work
Badge Position (X axis) and Badge Position (Y axis) will work when you select Badge Position is Custom otherwise it will not work
